summary: A teenager finds his dreams of becoming a basketball star threatened after he free falls into the harrowing world of drug addiction.

Korbin|Barton Heyman|Lawrence Barth|Gary Iorio|Toby Huss|Jim Carroll|William Webb|John C. Vennema|Michael Rapaport|Doc Dougherty|John Hoyt|Manny Siverio|Chris M. title: Diario de un rebelde
